org.odk.collect.android.utilities

Class FileUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.odk.collect.android.utilities.FileUtils

  • public class FileUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Static methods used for common file operations.

      • getBitmapScaledToDisplay

        public static android.graphics.Bitmap getBitmapScaledToDisplay(java.io.File file,
                                                               int screenHeight,
                                                               int screenWidth,
                                                               boolean upscaleEnabled)
        Scales image according to the given display
        Parameters:
        file - containing the image
        screenHeight - height of the display
        screenWidth - width of the display
        upscaleEnabled - determines whether the image should be up-scaled or not if the window size is greater than the image size
        Returns:
        scaled bitmap

      • copyFile

      • getMetadataFromFormDefinition

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getMetadataFromFormDefinition(java.io.File formDefinitionXml)
        Given a form definition file, return a map containing form metadata. The form ID is required by the specification and will always be included. Title and version are optionally included. If the form definition contains a submission block, any or all of submission URI, base 64 RSA public key, auto-delete and auto-send may be included.
